item.title: Advanced matplotlib tutorial with library author John Hunter
item.description:
Summary

In this video tutorial from the 2012 PyData Workshop, John Hunter, author of matplotlib is going to give you some advanced insight into the plotting library.

Description

John's tutorial will focus on broader topics concerning a wide set of users, including:

  • customization
  • configuration
  • event handling
  • interacting with figures
  • tips & tricks
item.dc:creator: John Hunter

item.title: Matplotlib: Lessons from middle age. Or, how you too can turn a hundred lines of patch rejection into two hundred thousand lines of code.
item.dc:creator: John Hunter
